Text: I am uploading at between 750kbps-3mbps so give it a few hours and it will be 100% available on my end :) Enjoy

thanks 

i looked into it and you can play for free 'up to level 65' ... umm what about after that?  

you know if you're going to spend all that time leveling up your character, you are going to want to keep on playing, and what about all of the 'real live people' you are going to get to know on your way up to level 65... 


i'm sorry but i can't see myself making that kind of commitment, then giving it all up because the man is going to ask for a monthly fee that i am not willing to shell out because i'm a stingy bastard...heh ;)

good up tho

yeh I havent even played past level 10 yet haha. I am stuck on Oblivion on my ps3... I dont know anything about having to pay after a certain level though, if anything, like any mmo really, it might just be for special items or something.

You pay for perks and expansions that's all. 

But really everything is explained on the site itself...

http://www.lotro.com/free.php?tier=details
thanks for the info fellow pirates ... that's good to know! .... I might just give it a try then ... and again thanks for the up, uploader ;)
